data.title: Pooja Name Meaning in Hindi & English, Rashi, Nakshatra, Origin, Lucky Number
data.meta_description: Pooja is a Hindu baby girl name. Its meaning is "Idol Worship". Pooja name origin is Hindi. Write Pooja in Hindi : पूजा, And Numerology (Lucky number) is 3, Syllables is 2, Rashi is Kanya (P, TTHH), Nakshatra is Hastha (PU, POO, SHA, THA)., Baby names meaning in Urdu, Hindi

Pooja Name Meaning in English

What does the name Pooja mean? What is the meaning of the name Pooja, lucky number, lucky stone, origin and religion.

Name Pooja generally means Worship or Prayer or Devotion, is of Indian origin, Name Pooja is a Feminine (or Girl) name.

Pooja Name Numerology And Personality

Pooja has the numerology 6. The gender of this name Pooja is Girl. These people are very good at keeping a nice balance between everything. They do not really over do anything rather they know how do they need to keep limits in everything.

Those who have numerology 6 are thought to be one of the most mature people because they are extremely responsible for their things and they are also very protective of the people around them. The religion is hindu.

The meaning of this name is Idol worship.These are people who believe that they can only move forward in their lives if they have sympathy in their hearts and that is how they believe in nurturing. They are known to be the most sympathetic and kind towards the people around them no matter if they know them personally or not.
